li.p:
"Harriet Tubman Charter School is a learning community like no other! Each and every day, teachers and staff work tirelessly to provide the very best educational experience to our scholars! However, our scholars are the eccentric, energetic, and enthusiastic learners who truly make this school amazing! They are the stars and future trendsetters of tomorrow and we are all proud to be here together! We are not JUST a school; we are a FAMILY!
We love one another and we are devoted to growing our minds and our voices! It is such a privilege and an honor to wear the banner of Harriet Tubman in the Southeast Bronx and this video is a detailed look into the magic we all create everyday! ENJOY!"
- Ms. Meekins (K-4 Music Teacher)
Reinforcement of Whole Brain Teaching just before Class 5-1 recites the 7 continents through song. This will help the students memorize and locate each continent on the map.
li.span: Uploaded 5 years ago to 5. Fifth Grade

li.p: Students in 5-1 are using Whole Brain Teaching to demonstrate the class rules. The class verbally articulates each rule while performing assigned gestures simultaneously.
HTCS scholars in grades 5 through 8 participate in frequent hands on science labs.
We rounded up the 8th grade scholars for a fun filled, three-day trip to Washington D.C.

div.p: Grades K-8 I District 9, Region 1 I Authorizer: New York State Board of Regents
